Position Title:             Container Line Sales RepresentativeEmployment Type:     Full TimeSalary:                        up to 10K AED all-inclusive depending on experience and qualifications, plus yearly bonus and incrementJob Location:            Dubai, UAE About the Client:A global maritime group providing essential services to merchant fleets across the world. Job Description:  Sell full range of the company's products and services by generating proposals and presentations to clients.
Manage client relationships, prospect sales, and follow up on leads.
Ensure compliance to quality procedures, resolve client concerns, and report field feedback.
Update client profile, prepare various sales and market reports, and attend UAE exhibitions.
Collaborate with customer services, collect payments, and attend debrief meetings. Skills
Skills:
Male, 40 years old and below
At least 3 years UAE experience in the same industry (container main line)
Experience in increasing market coverage for the Container Line as per lineâ€™s dynamic strategies/ growth plans.
